verses.verse: Now those that sealed <WH2856> were, Nehemiah, <WH5166> the Tirshatha, <WH8660> the son <WH1121> of Hachaliah, <WH2446> and Zidkijah, <WH6667>
Maaziah, <WH4590> Bilgai, <WH1084> Shemaiah: <WH8098> these <WH428> were the priests. <WH3548>
And the Levites: <WH3881> both Jeshua <WH3442> the son <WH1121> of Azaniah, <WH245> Binnui <WH1131> of the sons <WH1121> of Henadad, <WH2582> Kadmiel; <WH6934>
And their brothers, <WH251> Shebaniah, <WH7645> Hodijah, <WH1940> Kelita, <WH7042> Pelaiah, <WH6411> Hanan, <WH2605>
The chief <WH7218> of the people; <WH5971> Parosh, <WH6551> Pahathmoab, <WH6355> Elam, <WH5867> Zatthu, <WH2240> Bani, <WH1137>

And the rest <WH7605> of the people, <WH5971> the priests, <WH3548> the Levites, <WH3881> the porters, <WH7778> the singers, <WH7891> the Nethinims, <WH5411> and all <WH3605> they that had separated <WH914> themselves from the people <WH5971> of the lands <WH776> to the law <WH8451> of God, <WH430> their wives, <WH802> their sons, <WH1121> and their daughters, <WH1323> every <WH3605> one having knowledge, <WH3045> and having understanding; <WH995>

They joined <WH2388> to their brothers, <WH251> their nobles, <WH117> and entered <WH935> into a curse, <WH423> and into an oath, <WH7621> to walk <WH3212> in God's <WH430> law, <WH8451> which <WH834> was given <WH5414> by Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of God, <WH430> and to observe <WH8104> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> our Lord, <WH113> and his judgments <WH4941> and his statutes; <WH2706>
And that we would not give <WH5414> our daughters <WH1323> to the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> not <WH3808> take <WH3947> their daughters <WH1323> for our sons: <WH1121>

And if the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> bring <WH935> ware <WH4728> or any victuals <WH7668> on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> to sell, <WH4376> that we would not buy <WH3947> it of them on the sabbath, <WH7676> or on the holy <WH6944> day: <WH3117> and that we would leave <WH5203> the seventh <WH7637> year, <WH8141> and the exaction <WH4855> of every <WH3605> debt. <WH3027>

Also we made <WH5975> ordinances <WH4687> for us, to charge <WH5414> ourselves yearly <WH8141> with the third <WH7992> part of a shekel <WH8255> for the service <WH5656> of the house <WH1004> of our God; <WH430>

For the show bread, <WH3899> <WH4635> and for the continual <WH8548> meat offering, <WH4503> and for the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering, of the sabbaths, <WH7676> of the new <WH2320> moons, <WH2320> for the set <WH4150> feasts, <WH4150> and for the holy <WH6944> things, and for the sin <WH2403> offerings to make an atonement <WH3722> for Israel, <WH3478> and for all <WH3605> the work <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> of our God. <WH430>

And we cast <WH5307> the lots <WH1486> among the priests, <WH3548> the Levites, <WH3881> and the people, <WH5971> for the wood <WH6086> offering, <WH7133> to bring <WH935> it into the house <WH1004> of our God, <WH430> after the houses <WH1004> of our fathers, <WH1> at times <WH6256> appointed <WH2163> year <WH8141> by year, <WH8141> to burn <WH1197> on the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> as it is written <WH3789> in the law: <WH8451>

And to bring <WH935> the first fruits <WH1061> of our ground, <WH127> and the first fruits <WH1061> of all <WH3605> fruit <WH6529> of all <WH3605> trees, <WH6086> year <WH8141> by year, <WH8141> to the house <WH1004> of the LORD: <WH3068>

Also the firstborn <WH1060> of our sons, <WH1121> and of our cattle, <WH929> as it is written <WH3789> in the law, <WH8451> and the firstborn <WH1062> of our herds <WH1241> and of our flocks, <WH6629> to bring <WH935> to the house <WH1004> of our God, <WH430> to the priests <WH3548> that minister <WH8334> in the house <WH1004> of our God: <WH430>

And that we should bring <WH935> the first fruits <WH7225> of our dough, <WH6182> and our offerings, <WH8641> and the fruit <WH6529> of all <WH3605> manner of trees, <WH6086> of wine <WH8492> and of oil, <WH3323> to the priests, <WH3548> to the chambers <WH3957> of the house <WH1004> of our God; <WH430> and the tithes <WH4643> of our ground <WH127> to the Levites, <WH3881> that the same <WH1992> Levites <WH3881> might have the tithes <WH6237> in all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of our tillage. <WH5656>

And the priest <WH3548> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> shall be with the Levites, <WH3881> when the Levites <WH3881> take tithes: <WH6237> and the Levites <WH3881> shall bring <WH5927> up the tithe <WH4643> of the tithes <WH4643> to the house <WH1004> of our God, <WH430> to the chambers, <WH3957> into the treasure <WH214> house. <WH1004>

For the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> shall bring <WH935> the offering <WH8641> of the corn, <WH1715> of the new <WH8492> wine, <WH8492> and the oil, <WH3323> to the chambers, <WH3957> where <WH8033> are the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary, <WH4720> and the priests <WH3548> that minister, <WH8334> and the porters, <WH7778> and the singers: <WH7891> and we will not forsake <WH5800> the house <WH1004> of our God. <WH430>
